title: It’s not ‘too late in the game’ to get into crypto: Pantera exec
contentSnippet: Bitcoin’s frequently rising price may have caused some investors to feel they missed the boat, but Pantera’s Cosmo Jiang says there’s still plenty of room on board.

title: Top MIT Researcher Shows Decentralization Could Speed Up Ethereum, Solana
contentSnippet: MIT’s Médard says decentralization isn’t an ideology as large systems fail under central control, and new Ethereum tests prove it in code.

title: US Bitcoin ETFs post 2nd-highest inflows since launch on crypto rally
contentSnippet: US spot Bitcoin ETFs recorded $1.18 billion in inflows on Monday, their biggest day since early November 2024, when Donald Trump was elected President of the US.

title: Fasset Wins Malaysia License to Launch First Stablecoin-Based Islamic Digital Bank
contentSnippet: Approval lets Fasset offer full-service, Shariah-compliant digital banking backed by stablecoins

title: MetaMask Confirms $30M Rewards Program, Links to Future Token
contentSnippet: MetaMask's rewards initiative aims to boost activity on Consensys’ Linea network and integrate its mUSD stablecoin.

title: India to Introduce RBI-Backed Digital Currency For Faster Transactions: Report
contentSnippet: The new offering will leverage blockchain technology for faster and safer transactions, minister Piyush Goyal said.

title: XRP Traders Eye Bullish Breakout Toward $3.10. Here's Why
contentSnippet: The $2.99 floor held on repeated defenses, leaving price boxed between $2.99 and $3.05 while ETF deadlines and rate speculation loom.

title: ソラナ・カンパニー、775億円相当SOL超を蓄積
contentSnippet: ナスダック上場のソラナ・カンパニーが6日、デジタル資産トレジャリー戦略の一環としてソラナの継続的な取得を発表した。220万SOL超と1500万ドル以上の現金を保有。

title: DOGE Surges 6% as Traders Eye Breakout to 35-Cents
contentSnippet: Support has shifted higher into the $0.27 zone as institutions pressed bids, with momentum now eyeing the $0.30 ceiling.

title: India to Roll Out RBI-Linked Digital Currency Amid Dismissal of Crypto With 'No Backing'
contentSnippet: Experts say India is replacing its "tax-and-tolerate" stance with stricter oversight, favoring state-guaranteed digital currency.

title: FIFAのトークン化チケット購入権RTB、スイス当局が賭博の疑いを調査
contentSnippet: スイスの賭博規制当局が、国際サッカー連盟公式の2026年W杯チケット購入権トークンを調査している。賭博に該当する可能性を検討中だ。

title: VanEck Sees Bitcoin Reaching Half of Gold’s Market Value—But When?
contentSnippet: VanEck forecasts Bitcoin could capture half of gold’s $26 trillion market cap, though analysts say such valuations could take years.

title: US Bitcoin reserve funding ‘can start anytime’ — Senator Lummis
contentSnippet: Crypto-friendly US Senator Cynthia Lummis said fundraising for a Strategic Bitcoin Reserve is mainly being held back by legislative “slog.”

title: Gold is just a breath away from $4K: Here’s what it means for Bitcoin
contentSnippet: Gold futures reached $4,000 per ounce for the first time amid surging demand for safe-haven assets. Analysts predict Bitcoin will follow suit.

title: シタデルのケン・グリフィンCEO、金とビットコインへの資金流入に懸念を表明
contentSnippet: ブルームバーグが10月7日に報じたところによると、シタデルのケン・グリフィン氏が投資家がドルより金を安全資産と見なし始めている状況に懸念を示した。デベースメント・トレードと呼ばれる金、銀、ビットコインへの投資拡大に言及。

title: EU weighs sanctions on ruble-backed stablecoin A7A5: Report
contentSnippet: Several banks in Russia, Belarus and Central Asia are also in the EU’s firing line for enabling crypto-related transactions, according to a Bloomberg report.

title: Crypto mining, treasury stocks strike gold as Bitcoin booms
contentSnippet: Bitcoin rallied to a new all-time high of over $126,000 on Monday, lifting share prices across crypto miners and some treasury companies.

title: 「年末にかけて金・仮想通貨・テック株を保有」著名投資家チューダー・ジョーンズ氏、リスクも指摘
contentSnippet: 著名投資家ポール・チューダー・ジョーンズ氏は、現在の株式市場における強気相場にはまだ大幅な上値余地があるとの見方を示した。年末にかけて金、仮想通貨、テック株を組み合わせて保有すると説明している。

title: Asia Morning Briefing: Regional Crypto Power Balance Is Shifting as Japan 'Ready to Pop’
contentSnippet: On the sidelines of Token2049 in Singapore, crypto execs kept returning to the same theme: Tokyo is becoming the region’s new crypto capital.

title: Plume Network、SECにトランスファー・エージェント登録　価格20%以上高騰
contentSnippet: RWA特化のPlume Networkが米証券取引委員会からトランスファー・エージェント資格を取得した。米国証券市場のオンチェーン化を進めるとしている。

title: HumanoidExo Turns Human Motion Into Data That Teaches Robots to Walk
contentSnippet: The new system uses a wearable exoskeleton to record human motion and teach humanoid robots complex, full-body skills.

title: イーサリアムのM2相関性ラグ解消で価格1万ドル到達の可能性＝アナリスト分析
contentSnippet: Cryptoquantのアナリストは米M2マネーサプライの拡大とイーサリアムの流動性ラグについて分析し取引所在庫の減少と機関投資家の買い需要増加を背景にETH価格がこのサイクルで1万ドルに到達する可能性があると大胆予測。

title: BlackRock's most profitable ETF is now a ‘hair away' from $100B
contentSnippet: The iShares Bitcoin Trust ETF, or IBIT, has earned BlackRock $25 million more in fees than its second-most profitable ETF and is just shy of reaching $100 billion in net assets.

title: メタプラネット、ビットコイン含み益が810億円に到達
contentSnippet: 10月7日の報道によると、世界第4位のビットコイン保有企業メタプラネットの含み益が5億4000万ドル（約810億円）に達し過去最高を記録。PHASE II戦略による今後の展開が注目される。

title: Eliza Labs Founder on Why AI Agents Shouldn’t Manage Your Money—Yet
contentSnippet: Walters said AI agents aren’t ready to manage money, arguing their current value lies in structuring market data and executing faster trades.

title: 仮想通貨投資商品、先週は過去最大の約9000億円が純流入＝CoinShares
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨投資企業CoinSharesは、先週のデジタル資産の投資商品への資金流純入額は約8,940億円だったと発表。ビットコインの投資商品への流入が最も多かったとし、要因の分析もしている。

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
contentSnippet: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

title: ストラテジー、週次のビットコイン購入を一時停止　含み益約5兆円に
contentSnippet: 世界最大のビットコイン保有企業ストラテジーが9月29日から10月5日の週にビットコインを購入しなかったことが最新のSEC提出書類で明らかになった。優先株の配当支払いで1億4000万ドルを支出。

title: Bitcoin Rally Fueled by Perfect Macro Storm; Ether, DOGE, BNB Surge
contentSnippet: Bitcoin's breakout suggests further upside above $130,000, but a pullback to $118,000 remain possible, Deribit's CCO said.

title: Activist investor pushes Polygon tokenomics overhaul amid POL price slump
contentSnippet: Activist investor calls for Polygon to scrap 2% inflation and launch buybacks to rescue POL’s price and restore investor confidence.

title: Altcoin prices rise as USDT dominance falls: Is ‘altseason’ here?
contentSnippet: USDT dominance dropped as a key altcoin market capitalization metric rose to $1.18 trillion, hinting that a cautiously brewing altseason may be next.

title: グレースケール、米国初のステーキング機能付き現物仮想通貨ETFを開始
contentSnippet: グレースケール・インベストメンツが6日、イーサリアムとソラナのステーキング機能を備えた米国初の現物仮想通貨ETFの提供を開始した。

title: Bitcoin Mining Stocks Jump as Crypto Market Continues Historic Rally
contentSnippet: Bitcoin mining company stocks are soaring as the price of the leading cryptocurrency breaks new all-time highs.

title: Figure Gets Mixed Wall Street Debut as KBW, BofA Diverge on Outlook
contentSnippet: The newly public blockchain lender earns praise for market share in tokenized credit, but concerns remain over scaling and regulation.

title: MetaMask Reveals $30 Million Rewards Program Ahead of Token Drop
contentSnippet: Prominent Ethereum wallet MetaMask is gearing up to debut its own token, and will roll out a Linea-fueled rewards program in the run-up.

title: OpenAI Just Turned ChatGPT Into an App Platform
contentSnippet: ChatGPT's maker also unveiled a drag-and-drop platform for building AI agents at DevDay 2025, but the polish comes with strings attached.

title: Elon Musk's xAI Seeks 'Video Games Tutor' to Train Grok Ahead of Gaming Push
contentSnippet: Elon Musk is bullish on using AI to generate video games, and now xAI is hiring a specialist to teach its chatbot Grok how to do just that.

title: Cathie Wood's ARK Bets on Tokenization With a Stake in BlackRock-Backed Securitize
contentSnippet: The ARK Venture Fund invested around $10 million in the tokenization specialist, according to CoinDesk's calculation.

title: Why Is Everyone Suddenly Talking About Privacy Coin Zcash Again?
contentSnippet: The coin is still down 95% from its 2016 all-time high.

title: Ex-BlockFi CEO Zac Prince Returns to Crypto Spotlight to Lead Galaxy Digital’s New Banking Platform
contentSnippet: Prince's BlockFi became a symbol of crypto’s lending boom and bust, offering interest-bearing accounts, before collapsing when FTX’s failure left it short of liquidity.
